00014 void CPlayGameVorticon::processInLevel()
00015 {
00016  if(!m_gameover)
00017  {
00018   // Perform player Objects...
00019   for( int i=0 ; i<m_NumPlayers ; i++ )
00020   {
00021    // check if someone has lifes
00022    if(m_Player[i].inventory.lives==0 && m_Player[i].pdie==PDIE_DEAD)
00023     continue;
00024 
00025    // Process the other stuff like, items, jump, etc.
00026    m_Player[i].processInLevel();
00027 
00028    // If the player touched a hint trigger in which we have to show a Message, do it so
00029    std::string hinttext;
00030    if( (hinttext=m_Player[i].pollHintMessage()) != "")
00031     m_MessageBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString(hinttext), false, true) );
00032 
00033    // Check if the first player is dead, and if the others also are...
00034    if(i==0) m_alldead = (m_Player[i].pdie == PDIE_DEAD);
00035    else m_alldead &= (m_Player[i].pdie == PDIE_DEAD);
00036 
00037    // Now draw the player to the screen
00038    m_Player[i].SelectFrame();
00039 
00040    // If Player has toggled a switch for platform extend it!
00041    int trigger = m_Player[i].pollLevelTrigger();
00042    if( trigger != LVLTRIG_NONE )
00043    {
00044     processLevelTrigger(trigger);
00045    }
00046 
00047    // finished the level
00048    if(m_Player[i].level_done == LEVEL_COMPLETE)
00049    {
00050     mp_level_completed[m_Level] = true;
00051     goBacktoMap();
00052     break;
00053    }
00054    else if(m_Player[i].level_done == LEVEL_TELEPORTER)
00055    { // This happens, when keen used the inlevel teleporter...
00056     goBacktoMap();
00057     teleportPlayerFromLevel(m_Player[i], m_checkpoint_x, m_checkpoint_y);
00058     break;
00059    }
00060   }
00061 
00062   // Check if all players are dead. In that case, go back to map
00063   if(m_alldead)
00064   {
00065    g_pMusicPlayer->stop();
00066    m_gameover = true; // proof contrary case
00067    for( int i=0 ; i<m_NumPlayers ; i++ )
00068     m_gameover &= ( m_Player[i].inventory.lives < 0 );
00069 
00070    if(!m_gameover) // Check if no player has lifes left and must go in game over mode.
00071     goBacktoMap();
00072   }
00073  }
00074 }
00075 
00076 // called when a switch is flipped. mx,my is the pixel coords of the switch,
00077 // relative to the upper-left corner of the map.
00078 // TODO: Should be part of an object
00079 void CPlayGameVorticon::processLevelTrigger(int trigger)
00080 {
00081  if (trigger == LVLTRIG_TANTALUS_RAY)
00082  {
00083   m_Map.m_Dark = false;
00084   g_pMusicPlayer->stop();
00085   g_pGfxEngine->Palette.setdark(m_Map.m_Dark);
00086   mp_Finale = new CTantalusRay(m_Map, m_Object, *mp_ObjectAI);
00087   m_gameover = true;
00088  }
00089  else if (trigger == LVLTRIG_BRIDGE)
00090  { // it's a moving platform switch--don't allow player to hit it again while
00091   // the plat is still moving as this will glitch
00092 
00093   // The spawning of the plat extension is defined in the CPlayer class
00094  }
00095  else if (trigger == LVLTRIG_LIGHT)
00096  {
00097   m_Map.m_Dark = !m_Map.m_Dark;
00098   g_pGfxEngine->Palette.setdark(m_Map.m_Dark);
00099  }
00100 }
